actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: Joint resolution designating April 8, 1976, as National Food Day.

summary.text: Designates April 8, 1976, as "National Food Day". Authorizes the President to issue a proclamation to promote public involvement in developing a national policy guided by the needs of people, both in the United States and abroad.

titles.title: Joint resolution designating April 8, 1976, as National Food Day.
